action_description: This action will start your Moodo with TOP fan power for selected period of time.
This action will start your Moodo.

action: Switch Moodo AIR into Purifier mode
action_description: This action will make Moodo AIR device to purify air instead of blowing out fragrance.
This action will stop your Moodo.

action: Switch Moodo AIR into Diffuser mode
action_description: This action will make Moodo AIR device to blow out fragrance instead of air purifying.
